questions.guidance: Threat modeling process review. Look for: methodology documented such as STRIDE or PASTA; timing defined; results documented.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Threat modeling methodology and timing in SDLC and results documented and issues tracked and regular review
questions.red_flags: No methodology; Timing undefined; Results not documented; Issues not tracked; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Threat modeling not performed or methodology not documented.

questions.question: Are secure coding standards defined?
questions.guidance: Standards definition review. Look for: standards document available; OWASP alignment; language-specific guidance.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Secure coding standards documented and OWASP aligned and language-specific and regularly reviewed and communicated
questions.red_flags: No standards; Not OWASP aligned; Not language-specific; Not reviewed; Not communicated
questions.nc_pattern: Secure coding standards not defined or not aligned with industry guidance.

questions.question: Is static analysis performed?
questions.guidance: SAST implementation review. Look for: SAST tools deployed; CI/CD integration; finding remediation tracked.
questions.what_good_looks_like: SAST tools deployed and CI/CD integration and findings tracked and remediation verified and regular review
questions.red_flags: No SAST; Not integrated; Findings not tracked; Remediation not verified; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Static analysis not performed or not integrated into development pipeline.

questions.question: Are OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities addressed?
questions.guidance: OWASP coverage review. Look for: awareness of OWASP Top 10; coding practices address each; validation requirements documented.
questions.what_good_looks_like: OWASP Top 10 addressed and coding practices documented and validation requirements and training provided and verified in testing
questions.red_flags: OWASP not addressed; Practices undocumented; Validation missing; No training; Not tested
questions.nc_pattern: OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities not addressed in secure coding practices.

questions.question: Is code peer reviewed?
questions.guidance: Peer review process. Look for: review process documented; security considered in reviews; reviewer qualification requirements.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Peer review process and security consideration and reviewer qualifications and records maintained and issues tracked
questions.red_flags: No peer review; Security not considered; No qualifications; No records; Issues not tracked
questions.nc_pattern: Code peer review not performed or security not considered in reviews.

questions.question: How are secrets managed?
questions.guidance: Secrets management review. Look for: no hardcoded secrets policy; secrets management tools; secret scanning in CI/CD.
questions.what_good_looks_like: No hardcoded secrets policy and secrets management tools and secret scanning and detection alerts and remediation tracked
questions.red_flags: Hardcoded secrets allowed; No management tools; No scanning; No alerts; Remediation not tracked
questions.nc_pattern: Secrets management not implemented or hardcoded secrets not detected.

questions.question: Is security testing defined in SDLC?
questions.guidance: Testing definition review. Look for: testing requirements documented; test types specified; coverage expectations defined.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Security testing in SDLC and test types specified and coverage expectations and mandatory requirements and documented
questions.red_flags: Not in SDLC; Types not specified; Coverage unclear; Not mandatory; Not documented
questions.nc_pattern: Security testing not defined as mandatory in SDLC.

questions.question: Is DAST performed?
questions.guidance: DAST implementation review. Look for: DAST tools used; scan frequency; finding remediation tracked.
questions.what_good_looks_like: DAST tools deployed and appropriate frequency and findings tracked and remediation verified and integrated in process
questions.red_flags: No DAST; Infrequent scanning; Findings not tracked; Remediation not verified; Not integrated
questions.nc_pattern: Dynamic application security testing not performed or not integrated.

questions.question: Is penetration testing performed?
questions.guidance: Pen testing process review. Look for: testing frequency; scope appropriate; qualified testers; finding tracking.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Regular pen testing and scope appropriate and qualified testers and findings tracked and remediation verified
questions.red_flags: No pen testing; Scope limited; Unqualified testers; Findings not tracked; Not verified
questions.nc_pattern: Penetration testing not performed on applications or scope insufficient.

questions.question: Are findings remediated before release?
questions.guidance: Finding remediation review. Look for: remediation SLAs; blocking criteria for release; exception process documented.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Remediation SLAs and blocking criteria and exception process and verification before release and audit trail
questions.red_flags: No SLAs; No blocking criteria; No exception process; No verification; No audit trail
questions.nc_pattern: Security findings not required to be remediated before release.

questions.question: Does acceptance testing include security?
questions.guidance: UAT security review. Look for: security criteria in acceptance testing; testing evidence documented; sign-off obtained.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Security criteria in UAT and testing evidence and sign-off obtained and documented and tracked
questions.red_flags: No security in UAT; No evidence; No sign-off; Not documented; Not tracked
questions.nc_pattern: Security criteria not included in user acceptance testing.

questions.question: Are security requirements in development contracts?
questions.guidance: Contract requirements review. Look for: security requirements documented; standards specified; deliverable criteria defined.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Security requirements in contracts and standards specified and deliverable criteria and enforcement and reviewed
questions.red_flags: Not in contracts; Standards not specified; Criteria undefined; Not enforced; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Security requirements not included in outsourced development contracts.

questions.question: How is outsourced development monitored?
questions.guidance: Development oversight review. Look for: progress reviews; security checkpoints; code review rights exercised.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Progress reviews include security and security checkpoints and code review rights and documented oversight and issues addressed
questions.red_flags: No progress reviews; No checkpoints; Rights not exercised; Oversight undocumented; Issues not addressed
questions.nc_pattern: Outsourced development security not monitored or checkpoints not implemented.

questions.question: Is delivered code security tested?
questions.guidance: Delivered code testing review. Look for: testing requirements documented; internal review conducted; acceptance criteria applied.
questions.auditor_focus: Is vendor code tested by you?
questions.what_good_looks_like: Testing requirements documented and internal security testing and acceptance criteria and results documented and issues tracked
questions.red_flags: No testing requirements; No internal testing; No acceptance criteria; Results not documented; Issues not tracked
questions.nc_pattern: Delivered code from outsourced development not security tested on receipt.

questions.question: Are IP rights protected?
questions.guidance: IP protection review. Look for: contract clauses for IP; code ownership clarity; confidentiality provisions.
questions.what_good_looks_like: IP clauses in contracts and code ownership clear and confidentiality provisions and documented and enforced
questions.red_flags: No IP clauses; Ownership unclear; No confidentiality; Not documented; Not enforced
questions.nc_pattern: Intellectual property rights not protected in outsourced development contracts.

questions.question: How are security defects handled?
questions.guidance: Defect handling review. Look for: defect resolution requirements; warranty provisions; remediation SLAs documented.
questions.auditor_focus: Are security fixes covered in warranty?
questions.what_good_looks_like: Defect resolution requirements and warranty provisions and remediation SLAs and documented and enforced
questions.red_flags: No defect requirements; No warranty; No SLAs; Not documented; Not enforced
questions.nc_pattern: Security defect handling not defined in outsourced development contracts.

questions.question: Are dev test and prod environments separated?
questions.guidance: Environment separation review. Look for: environment segregation implemented; separate infrastructure where appropriate; access controls differentiated.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Environments segregated and separate infrastructure where appropriate and access controls differentiated and documented and verified
questions.red_flags: Not segregated; Shared infrastructure inappropriately; Same access; Not documented; Not verified
questions.nc_pattern: Development test and production environments not adequately separated.

questions.question: Is access appropriately restricted per environment?
questions.guidance: Environment access review. Look for: different access rights by environment; production access limited; justification required for prod access.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Different access by environment and production limited and justification required and documented and regularly reviewed
questions.red_flags: Same access all environments; Production unrestricted; No justification; Not documented; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Environment access not appropriately restricted for production systems.

questions.question: Is production data protected in non-production?
questions.guidance: Non-production data review. Look for: no production data in dev or test; data masking applied; synthetic data used where appropriate.
questions.auditor_focus: Is real data in test environments?
questions.what_good_looks_like: No production data in non-prod or data masked and synthetic data option and verification conducted and documented
questions.red_flags: Production data in test; No masking; No synthetic option; Not verified; Not documented
questions.nc_pattern: Production data not protected in non-production environments.

questions.question: How is code promoted between environments?
questions.guidance: Code promotion review. Look for: promotion process documented; approvals required; deployment pipeline controls.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Promotion process documented and approvals required and pipeline controls and audit trail and regular review
questions.red_flags: Process undocumented; No approvals; No pipeline controls; No audit trail; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Code promotion between environments not controlled or not documented.

questions.question: Are configuration differences documented?
questions.guidance: Configuration management review. Look for: environment configuration documented; parity tracking where appropriate; differences justified.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Environment configs documented and parity tracked and differences justified and regular review and change controlled
questions.red_flags: Configs undocumented; Parity not tracked; Differences unjustified; Not reviewed; Not change controlled
questions.nc_pattern: Environment configuration differences not documented or not justified.

questions.question: Provide your change management process.
questions.guidance: Change process review. Look for: change policy documented; process documented; CAB or approval structure defined.
questions.auditor_focus: Is there a formal change process?
questions.what_good_looks_like: Change policy documented and process documented and CAB or approval structure and enforced and regularly reviewed
questions.red_flags: No policy; Process undocumented; No approval structure; Not enforced; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Change management process not documented or not implemented.

questions.question: Are changes assessed for security impact?
questions.guidance: Security impact assessment review. Look for: security impact assessment in process; risk evaluation required; approval includes security consideration.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Security impact assessment required and risk evaluation and security in approval and documented and consistently applied
questions.red_flags: No impact assessment; No risk evaluation; Security not in approval; Not documented; Inconsistent
questions.nc_pattern: Security impact not assessed as part of change management process.

questions.question: Is testing performed before deployment?
questions.guidance: Pre-deployment testing review. Look for: testing requirements documented; test environments used; security testing included.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Testing required before deployment and environments used and security testing included and results documented and issues addressed
questions.red_flags: Testing not required; No environments; Security not included; Results not documented; Issues not addressed
questions.nc_pattern: Testing not mandatory before production deployment.

questions.question: Are changes approved before implementation?
questions.guidance: Approval process review. Look for: approval workflow documented; authorised approvers defined; emergency process documented.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Approval workflow documented and authorised approvers and emergency process and enforcement and audit trail
questions.red_flags: No workflow; Approvers undefined; No emergency process; Not enforced; No audit
questions.nc_pattern: Change approval not required or not enforced before implementation.

questions.question: Is there rollback capability?
questions.guidance: Rollback review. Look for: rollback procedures documented; tested regularly; backup before change required.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Rollback procedures documented and tested regularly and backup before change and demonstrated capability and time to rollback known
questions.red_flags: No rollback procedures; Not tested; No backup requirement; Capability not demonstrated; Time unknown
questions.nc_pattern: Rollback capability not defined or not tested for changes.

questions.question: Are changes documented and auditable?
questions.guidance: Change documentation review. Look for: change records maintained; audit trail complete; post-implementation review conducted.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Change records maintained and audit trail complete and post-implementation review and traceability and accessible for audit
questions.red_flags: Records not maintained; Audit trail incomplete; No PIR; No traceability; Not accessible
questions.nc_pattern: Changes not documented with sufficient detail for audit purposes.

questions.question: How is test data managed?
questions.guidance: Test data management review. Look for: test data policy; data generation approach; production data restrictions.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Test data policy documented and generation approach and production restrictions and documented and enforced
questions.red_flags: No policy; No approach; No restrictions; Not documented; Not enforced
questions.nc_pattern: Test data not managed according to documented policy.

questions.question: Is production data masked for testing?
questions.guidance: Test data masking review. Look for: masking procedures documented; anonymisation applied; verification conducted.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Masking procedures documented and anonymisation applied and verification conducted and documented and regularly reviewed
questions.red_flags: No masking procedures; No anonymisation; No verification; Not documented; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Production data not masked when used for testing purposes.

questions.question: Is test data protected appropriately?
questions.guidance: Test data protection review. Look for: access controls applied; encryption where appropriate; disposal procedures.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Access controls and encryption where appropriate and disposal procedures and documented and verified
questions.red_flags: No access controls; No encryption; No disposal; Not documented; Not verified
questions.nc_pattern: Test data not protected appropriately for sensitivity level.

questions.question: How is control testing planned?
questions.guidance: Control testing planning review. Look for: testing program documented; coverage defined; evidence collection planned.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Testing program documented and coverage defined and evidence collection and schedule and resources assigned
questions.red_flags: No testing program; Coverage undefined; Evidence not planned; No schedule; No resources
questions.nc_pattern: Security control testing program not planned or documented.

questions.question: Are test environments secured?
questions.guidance: Test environment security review. Look for: environment security controls; access controls; data protection applied.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Security controls applied and access controls and data protection and documented and regularly reviewed
questions.red_flags: No security controls; No access controls; No data protection; Not documented; Not reviewed
questions.nc_pattern: Test environments not secured appropriately.

controls.control_name: Protection of Information Systems During Audit Testing

questions.question: Are audit tests planned and agreed?
questions.guidance: Audit planning review. Look for: audit planning conducted; scope agreed; timing coordinated with operations.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Audit planning conducted and scope agreed and timing coordinated and documented and stakeholders informed
questions.red_flags: No planning; Scope not agreed; Timing not coordinated; Not documented; Stakeholders not informed
questions.nc_pattern: Audit testing not planned or coordinated with operations.

questions.question: Is auditor access controlled?
questions.guidance: Auditor access review. Look for: access provisioning process; monitoring of auditor access; time-limited access.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Access provisioning process and monitoring active and time-limited and audit trail and access removed post-audit
questions.red_flags: No provisioning process; No monitoring; Permanent access; No audit trail; Access not removed
questions.nc_pattern: Auditor access not controlled or monitored during audit testing.

questions.question: Are audit tools approved?
questions.guidance: Audit tool approval review. Look for: tool assessment conducted; approval process followed; security review completed.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Tool assessment conducted and approval obtained and security review and documented and tracked
questions.red_flags: No assessment; No approval; No security review; Not documented; Not tracked
questions.nc_pattern: Audit tools not assessed or approved before use.

questions.question: How is production impact minimised?
questions.guidance: Production protection review. Look for: testing windows defined; read-only access where possible; non-production use preferred.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Testing windows and read-only access and non-production preferred and impact assessment and documented
questions.red_flags: No testing windows; Unrestricted access; Production only; No impact assessment; Not documented
questions.nc_pattern: Production systems not protected from audit testing impact.

questions.question: Is audit evidence protected?
questions.guidance: Evidence protection review. Look for: evidence handling procedures; confidentiality maintained; secure transmission.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Evidence handling procedures and confidentiality maintained and secure transmission and access controlled and disposal addressed
questions.red_flags: No handling procedures; Confidentiality not maintained; Insecure transmission; Uncontrolled access; Disposal not addressed
questions.nc_pattern: Audit evidence not protected during collection and transmission.

questions.question: Are regulatory audit requirements addressed?
questions.guidance: Regulatory audit preparation review. Look for: regulatory preparation documented; evidence availability; compliance demonstration capability.
questions.what_good_looks_like: Regulatory preparation documented and evidence available and compliance demonstrable and regular review and gaps addressed
questions.red_flags: No preparation; Evidence unavailable; Cannot demonstrate; Not reviewed; Gaps not addressed
questions.nc_pattern: Regulatory audit requirements not adequately addressed or evidence unavailable.
